nodes.bodyText: nit: the user may not understand "command" - maybe "run one or more ksql statements and quit."?
nodes.diffHunk:

           + "defaults to TABULAR)")

+  @SuppressWarnings("unused") // Accessed via reflection
+  @Option(
+      name = {EXECUTE_OPTION, EXECUTE_SHORT_OPTION},
+      description = "Execute a command and quit.")
